title: As someone with 1.0m+ Mastery, something i really miss is...
body:
Hello, im Panda Annie (Most Played Annie OCE) 
i just wanted to say~ personally the new client i find awesome, and im sure you guys at rito tried to add as many old features as possible while also making it feel fresh!

But there is one thing that i reeeeeeally miss, as someone who plays one champ to the point of passing everyone on a whole server, the new client doesn't feel as rewarding for people like myself~


(http://imgur.com/a/PYEYh) <Reference>
on the old client if was right in your face and as someone who surpassed 1m even seeing it change from 000K to 0.0m although small felt super rewarding!, seeing your profile grow felt super nice!

But now if just feels like a waste to even try... which does not feel nice. 
it just is a jumbled bunch of numbers now...

i was just wondering if you were ever gonna add that back? if not instead of something like 1605512 (which just looks like a mess) even when you hover over if they could add comma's i feel like it would look 10x nicer and feel rewarding again, for example 1,605,512, see how just adding commas it looks so much better over all and that wouldn't be to hard to program in.

its just a small add on~ but makes it feel so much better 

i have asked some of the other Most Played ____'s OCE what they think and they feel the same way,
But eyy, for other people it may not bother them, still think that it would be super easy to add in.

what do you people think?

Thanks
-Panda Annie

replies.body: I'm not the type of person to play just 1 champ to the max but I agree, commas are really quite nice and would take someone no time at all to implement.

I almost feel like there should be a single employee dedicated (probably for a short time) to finding and bringing to the attention of the team all of these types of quality of life fixes/features. So many people get unnecessarily annoyed at Riot for the many small but frustrating oversights that can be extremely easily remedied.
